items.content_html: A few friends and I are about to launch our longboard-based apple pie delivery service. We bake ‘em, we give ‘em to the neighbors. Any good recipes you guys would recommend?
items.content_text: A few friends and I are about to launch our longboard-based apple pie delivery service. We bake 'em, we give 'em to the neighbors. Any good recipes you guys would recommend?

items.content_html: I’m going to start a Twitch this year! Anybody have experience with that?
items.content_text: I'm going to start a Twitch this year! Anybody have experience with that?

items.content_html: Does anybody use Apple stickers? If so, why, and where do you put them?
items.content_text: Does anybody use Apple stickers? If so, why, and where do you put them?

items.title: Mask ü§ø
items.content_html: Princess Bride: “Why do you wear a mask?” “They’re terribly comfortable. I think everyone will be wearing them in the future.” üçø
items.content_text: Princess Bride: "Why do you wear a mask?" "They're terribly comfortable. I think everyone will be wearing them in the future." üçø

items.title: Adventure üß≥
items.content_html: I’m building an adventure kit. I need ultra-useful things that can fit into a backpack. What kind of things are your go-to essentials?
items.content_text: I'm building an *adventure kit*. I need ultra-useful things that can fit into a backpack. What kind of things are your go-to essentials?

items.title: Bunny Hat üê∞
items.content_html: Ten-minute knits: Santa hats for bunnies.
items.content_text: Ten-minute knits: Santa hats for bunnies.

items.title: Graduate üéì
items.content_html: I graduated this week. Had a tiny celebration with fewer than 10 people, social distanced, masks. I got a slide for my commencement ceremony, which was a glorified zoom call with hundreds of students. I’m still super excited to be done!
items.content_text: I graduated this week. Had a tiny celebration with fewer than 10 people, social distanced, masks. I got a *slide* for my commencement ceremony, which was a glorified zoom call with hundreds of students. I'm still *super excited* to be done!

items.title: Food For Thought ü•™
items.content_html: Anyone in Central Virginia, try Food For Thought for some patriotic fine dining. It’s super delicious.
items.content_text: Anyone in Central Virginia, try **Food For Thought** for some patriotic fine dining. It's super delicious.

items.title: Paper üóû
items.content_html:
Getting splendid with the wrapping paper.

Figured out, finally, how to wrap without using any tape. I’ve never felt more like a fake hipster. Little watercolors to add some spice to the labels. Each one gives a hint to what’s inside.
items.content_text: # Getting splendid with the wrapping paper. Figured out, _finally_, how to wrap without using any tape. I've never felt more like a fake hipster. Little watercolors to add some spice to the labels. Each one gives a hint to what's inside.
